thread.title: Want to know who's killing the small retail stores? Look in the mirror: Ted Diadiun
thread.title_full: Want to know who's killing the small retail stores? Look in the mirror: Ted Diadiun

author: Ted Diadiun
title: Want to know who's killing the small retail stores? Look in the mirror: Ted Diadiun
text: Soon enough our choices will devolve to either the antiseptic Internet, or the big box stores, where you are lucky to find a salesperson who is conversant with whatever you are looking to buy. If you can find a salesperson at all, writes Ted Diadiun.
